incidents.name: Authy API Affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Authy API was degraded for 40 seconds between 09:13:09 and 09:13:49 Pacific Time on 10/26/2025. During this period of time customers may have experienced increased number of 500 errors. The issue has now been resolved.

Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Authy API; Increased number of 500 errors . We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Console users unable to access the My Accounts and Project Summary pages
